 "Kreira novog korisnika u bazi."
 [conn user-name]
 (println "Dodajem korisnika:" user-name)
 @(d/transact conn [{:user/name user-name
 :user/xp 0
 :user/level 0}]))

;; Ova funkcija je malo kompleksnija, ali radi ispravno!
(defn add-xp!
 "Dodaje XP poene postojećem korisniku."
 [conn user-id amount]
 (let [current-xp (d/q '[:find ?xp . ; tačka znači "vrati mi samo vrednost"
 :in $ ?user-id
 :where [?user-id :user/xp ?xp]]
 (d/db conn) user-id)
 new-xp (+ (or current-xp 0) amount)]
 (println "Menjam XP za korisnika" user-id "sa" current-xp "na" new-xp)
 @(d/transact conn [{:db/id user-id, :user/xp new-xp}])))
", :offset 772, :ns "project.db"} {:command "(defn find-user-by-name
 "Pronalazi korisnika po imenu i vraća celu mapu."
 [db-val user-name]
 (d/pull db-val "[*]" [:user/name user-name]))", :offset 144, :ns "project.db"} {:command "(ns project.db
 (:require [datomic.api :as d ]))

;; --- 1. PODEŠAVANJA KONEKCIJE ---

(def db-uri "datomic:dev://localhost:4334/seminarski")

(defn connect
 "Povezuje se na bazu i vraća konekciju."
 []
 (d/connect db-uri))

(defn create-db!
 "Kreira bazu ako ne postoji. Ovo se izvršava samo jednom!"
 []
 (println "Pokušavam da kreiram bazu na" db-uri)
 (d/create-database db-uri))


;; --- 2. DEFINICIJA ŠEME ---

(def user-schema [{:db/ident :user/name
 :db/valueType :db.type/string
 :db/unique :db.unique/identity ; Ime korisnika mora biti jedinstveno
 :db/cardinality :db.cardinality/one
 :db/doc "Korisničko ime"}

 {:db/ident :user/xp
 :db/valueType :db.type/long
 :db/cardinality :db.cardinality/one
 :db/doc "Broj XP poena"}

 {:db/ident :user/level
 :db/valueType :db.type/long
 :db/cardinality :db.cardinality/one
 :db/doc "Nivo korisnika"}])

(defn install-schema!
 "Instalira šemu u bazu. Ovo se takođe izvršava samo jednom!"
 [conn]
 (println "Instaliram šemu...")
 @(d/transact conn user-schema))


;; --- 3. FUNKCIJE ZA RAD SA KORISNICIMA ---

(defn create-user!
 "Kreira novog korisnika u bazi."
 [conn user-name]
 (println "Dodajem korisnika:" user-name)
 @(d/transact conn [{:user/name user-name
 :user/xp 0
 :user/level 0}]))

;; Ova funkcija je malo kompleksnija, ali radi ispravno!
(defn add-xp!
 "Dodaje XP poene postojećem korisniku."
 [conn user-id amount]
 (let [current-xp (d/q '[:find ?xp . ; tačka znači "vrati mi samo vrednost"
 :in $ ?user-id
 :where [?user-id :user/xp ?xp]]
 (d/db conn) user-id)
 new-xp (+ (or current-xp 0) amount)]
 (println "Menjam XP za korisnika" user-id "sa" current-xp "na" new-xp)
 @(d/transact conn [{:db/id user-id, :user/xp new-xp}])))

(defn find-user-by-name
 "Pronalazi korisnika po imenu i vraća celu mapu."
 [db-val user-name]
 (d/pull db-val "[*]" [:user/name user-name]))", :offset 2205, :ns "project.db"} {:command "(ns project.db
 (:require [datomic.api :as d ]))

;; --- 1. PODEŠAVANJA KONEKCIJE ---

(def db-uri "datomic:dev://localhost:3306/bebetter")

 []

(def user-schema [{:db/ident :user/name

 :db/unique :db.unique/identity ; Ime korisnika mora biti jedinstveno
 :db/cardinality :db.cardinality/one
 :db/doc "Korisničko ime"}

 {:db/ident :user/xp

 :db/cardinality :db.cardinality/one

 [conn user-name]

 :user/xp 0
 :user/level 0}]))

 :in $ ?user-id

 (:require [datomic.api :as d ]))

;; --- 1. PODEŠAVANJA KONEKCIJE ---

(def db-uri "datomic:dev://localhost:4334/bebetter")

(defn connect
 "Povezuje se na bazu i vraća konekciju."
 []
 (d/connect db-uri))

(defn create-db!
 "Kreira bazu ako ne postoji. Ovo se izvršava samo jednom!"
 []
 (println "Pokušavam da kreiram bazu na" db-uri)
 (d/create-database db-uri))


;; --- 2. DEFINICIJA ŠEME ---

(def user-schema [{:db/ident :user/name
 :db/valueType :db.type/string
 :db/unique :db.unique/identity ; Ime korisnika mora biti jedinstveno
 :db/cardinality :db.cardinality/one
 :db/doc "Korisničko ime"}

 {:db/ident :user/xp
 :db/valueType :db.type/long
 :db/cardinality :db.cardinality/one
 :db/doc "Broj XP poena"}

 {:db/ident :user/level
 :db/valueType :db.type/long
 :db/cardinality :db.cardinality/one
 :db/doc "Nivo korisnika"}])

(defn install-schema!
 "Instalira šemu u bazu. Ovo se takođe izvršava samo jednom!"
 [conn]
 (println "Instaliram šemu...")
 @(d/transact conn user-schema))


;; --- 3. FUNKCIJE ZA RAD SA KORISNICIMA ---

(defn create-user!
 "Kreira novog korisnika u bazi."
 [conn user-name]
 (println "Dodajem korisnika:" user-name)
 @(d/transact conn [{:user/name user-name
 :user/xp 0
 :user/level 0}]))

;; Ova funkcija je malo kompleksnija, ali radi ispravno!
(defn add-xp!
 "Dodaje XP poene postojećem korisniku."
 [conn user-id amount]
 (let [current-xp (d/q '[:find ?xp . ; tačka znači "vrati mi samo vrednost"
 :in $ ?user-id
 :where [?user-id :user/xp ?xp]]
 (d/db conn) user-id)
 new-xp (+ (or current-xp 0) amount)]
 (println "Menjam XP za korisnika" user-id "sa" current-xp "na" new-xp)
 @(d/transact conn [{:db/id user-id, :user/xp new-xp}])))

(defn find-user-by-name
 "Pronalazi korisnika po imenu i vraća celu mapu."
 [db-val user-name]

(println uros)", :offset 130, :ns "project.db"} {:command "(add-xp! conn (:db/id uros) 50)", :offset 31, :ns "project.db"} {:command "(def db-snapshot-after (d/db conn))", :offset 35, :ns "project.db"} {:command "(find-user-by-name db-snapshot-after "Uros")", :offset 44, :ns "project.db"} {:command "(ns project.db
